name: The Resonant Crystal
description: A large crystal formation glows dimly in the center of the cavern. Its surface is etched with intricate patterns that seem to respond to sound.
promptTask:
Goal: Activate the crystal.
Lesson: Specificity in prompts.
Craft a command that specifies exactly how you want to interact with the crystal, providing specific details.
successMessage: As you gently tap the center of the crystal's etched pattern, it begins to glow brighter, resonating with a soft hum that fills the cavern.

feedback.vague: Specificity Error: Your command lacks detail. How exactly do you want to interact with the crystal?
feedback.wrongAction: Action Error: '{action}' is not the appropriate way to interact with this delicate crystal.
feedback.noTarget: Target Error: What do you want to {action}? Specify the target of your action.
feedback.wrongTarget: Target Error: There is no '{target}' here. The crystal is the focal point of this chamber.
feedback.tooGeneric: Detail Required: Your command needs more specificity. How/where exactly do you want to {action} the {target}?
feedback.negativeAction: Approach Error: A gentler approach is needed. The crystal appears delicate.
